entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -11.5°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.9°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
